long_description: The Chuckit! XXL Ultra Ball heightens Rover's playtime fun. It bounces higher, floats better and lasts longer than other balls used for fetch. Ball is bright orange for highly visibility. Note: the Chuckit! XXL Ultra Ball is not compatible with Chuckit! ball launchers.
short_description: The Chuckit! XXL Ultra Ball heightens Rover's playtime fun. It bounces higher, floats better and lasts longer than other balls used for fetch.
